name: WebhookSubscriptionInput
description: Specifies the input fields for a webhook subscription.

inputFields.name: callbackUrl
inputFields.description: URL where the webhook subscription should send the POST request when the event occurs.

inputFields.name: format
inputFields.description: The format in which the webhook subscription should send the data.

inputFields.name: includeFields
inputFields.description: The list of fields to be included in the webhook subscription.

inputFields.name: metafieldNamespaces
inputFields.description: The list of namespaces for any metafields that should be included in the webhook subscription.
